input.sentences: winter wonderland is my favorite place .
we looked at a great nativity .
there was a big beautiful statue .
even the carosuel was lit up .
output.sentences: The family was ready for a great time at the Winter Wonderland park.
We stopped by a stable to visit the reindeer.
There were even shows with costumed characters.
One of my favorite parts were some of the games they had at stands.
